channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After 9 months on hold, the Fed could cut rates in September. Why the long pause may extend stocks’ rally.
item.description: The long pause between rate cuts could be particularly bullish for equities, potentially extending and broadening the stock market’s rally, analysts s...

item.title: ‘The money went into his account’: Is my father trying to swindle me out of my grandparents’ $800K home?
item.description: “I came across a letter from my father’s bank showing a wire transfer of $195,000 from the buyer.”

item.title: Low expectations for retailers and ever-rising expectations for Nvidia in this week’s round of earnings
item.description: Earnings Watch: Nvidia reports amid questions about its ability to meet demand; also reporting are retailers like Gap and Ulta Beauty.

item.title: Are you middle class? No, you’re not. Here’s why.
item.description: The middle class is dead. Long live the middle class.

item.title: I’m a widow with $200,000 in a brokerage account. So why am I treated so poorly?
item.description: “I had to hunt high and low to have them sell my Tesla stock because it was tanking.”

item.title: Morgan Stanley picks this stock to play China’s emerging tourism trend

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 dividend stocks for steady returns
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service spotlights three dividend-paying stocks, including EOG Resources and Home Depot.

item.title: Challenging Buffett: Buying wonderful companies at fair prices isn't more profitable
item.description: A Macquarie analysis showed the opposite is true: buying fair companies at a wonderful price outperforms buying wonderful companies at a fair price.

item.title: Buy these outperforming stocks with room to run, says UBS
item.description: As earnings season winds down, investors should be on the lookout for some stocks that might still have room for upside, according to UBS.

item.title: Medtronic makes two key additions to its board. How activist Elliott can build shareholder value
item.description: The stage seems to be set for a long-term mutually beneficial relationship between the parties.
